resources.string: weeWX Khaw lum leh khaw vawt App
Settings Page ah hian a awm
I settings.txt ah URL kha ziak lut rawh
Refresh Time tih kha thlang rawh
Radar.html address chu ziak la (a duh chuan) .
Khaw lum leh khaw vawt Statistics
Vawiin Statistics kan rawn tarlang e
Nizan khan Statistics a rawn lang
Thla tin Statistics a awm thin
Background ah update a ni em?
Khaw lum leh khaw vawt Page
Webcam Page ah hian a awm
Data zawng zawng delete vek la, Shutdown rawh
Main screen-ah Radar emaw Forecast emaw a awm
weeWX Khaw lum leh khaw vawt App
I custom URL kha ziak la (optional) .
Widget Foreground-a rawng chi hrang hrang thlangtu
Widget Background rawng chi hrang hrang thlangtu
Glyph ai chuan icon hmang zawk ang em?
Kumin Statistics-ah hian a lang chiang hle
Forecast URL set a nih loh avangin settings.txt chu edit la, thlak rawh
He app hi update a ni tawh a mahse i connect na server hian weeWX tan Inigo Plugin a update lo. weeWX update a nih hma chuan fields a lang tha lo mai thei.
I URL submit kan verify chhung hian lo nghak rawh.
Data zawng zawng hi paih vek i duh em?
Icons te chu a download kim thei lo a, i retry a ngai dawn a ni.
Forecast icons a detect thei lo.
Ka Fix ang a, ka tum leh ang
Usage update tumnaah error a awm
Custom URL tarlan atang khan a connect thei lo va, a download thei lo bawk
I server atang khan webcam image i connect thei lo va, i download thei lo bawk
Forecast chu a connect thei lo va, a download thei lo bawk.
Forecast icons a detect thei lo.
Forecast type \'%1$s\' ah hian icons a awm a ngai a, Khawngaihin icons hman ah switch la, han try leh teh.
Forecast type \'%1$s\' a dik lo a, i settings file kha check la, han try leh teh.
Internet atanga radar= image a connect thei lo va, a download thei lo bawk
I server atanga data.txt connect emaw download emaw theih a ni lo
Data url chu a blank a
I server atang khan settings i connect thei lo va, i download thei lo bawk
URL chu default-ah set emaw, empty emaw a ni
Radar URL set lo emaw, download mek emaw a ni. Settings ah kal la, i thlak thei ang.
